thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Gold Mixed On Iran Risk

author: Benjamin Parkin
title: Gold Mixed On Iran Risk
text:
Gold prices swung between small gains and losses on Wednesday as investors began to take stock of potential geopolitical turmoil.
Some traders expected President Donald Trump’s decision to take the U.S. out of its nuclear deal with Iran to boost gold prices, as investors concerned about instability move money to so-called safe-haven assets like precious metals. Instead, the gold market was weighed down by a higher dollar after Tuesday’s announcement.
...
